docs.snippet: A simple and inexpensive test could be administered by any coach or parent to detect concussions in young players....
docs.abstract: A simple and inexpensive test could be administered by any coach or parent to detect concussions in young players.

headline.main: A Simple Flashcard Test to Detect Concussions

docs.snippet: Malika Yousufi lined her bike up alongside her teammates on a lonely road outside the Afghan capital, getting ready for her weekly training ride away from the disapproving stares of Kabul....

headline.main: Women's Cycling Team Pushes Past Roadblocks in Afghanistan

docs.snippet: Thiago Silva scored on a looping header over goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois in the 114th minute Wednesday night, lifting Paris Saint-Germain over Chelsea and into the Champions League quarterfinals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thiago Silva scored on a looping header over goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois in the 114th minute Wednesday night, lifting Paris Saint-Germain over Chelsea and into the Champions League quarterfinals.

headline.main: Thiago Silva Lifts PSG Over Chelsea Into Quarterfinals
headline.print_headline: Thiago Silva Lifts PSG Over Chelsea Into Quarterfinals

docs.snippet: It had been intended as a feel-good gesture for Jordanians still hurting over the brutal killing of one of their fighter pilots by Islamic State extremists: The city of Amman announced it would change the uniform colors of its street cleaners from...
docs.lead_paragraph: It had been intended as a feel-good gesture for Jordanians still hurting over the brutal killing of one of their fighter pilots by Islamic State extremists: The city of Amman announced it would change the uniform colors of its street cleaners from orange to turquoise because the old outfits were too similar to those worn by captives executed by the extremists.

headline.main: In Jordan, Feel-Good Gesture of Changing Uniform Backfires
headline.print_headline: In Jordan, Feel-Good Gesture of Changing Uniform Backfires

docs.snippet: Kathy Redmond, who accused a Nebraska football player of raping her in college, now teaches athletes to avoid the pitfalls of a perceived entitlement....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kathy Redmond, who accused a Nebraska football player of raping her in college, now teaches athletes to avoid the pitfalls of a perceived entitlement.
docs.abstract: Kansas City Royals are one of few Major League Baseball teams to take initiative beyond league requirement that employees attend presentation on violence against women; team asked Kathy Redmond, activist who was once raped by a Nebraska football player, to speak to team's minor league players as well, helping them navigate the pitfalls of perceived entitlement as they set out on their careers.

headline.main: Royals Hear a Personal Plea to End Violence Against Women
headline.print_headline: Royals Heed Plea to End Violence Against Women

docs.snippet: Thiago Silva's extra-time header sent Paris St Germain into the Champions League quarter-finals on away goals after they overcame the sending-off of talisman Zlatan Ibrahimovic to secure a brave 2-2 draw with Chelsea on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thiago Silva's extra-time header sent Paris St Germain into the Champions League quarter-finals on away goals after they overcame the sending-off of talisman Zlatan Ibrahimovic to secure a brave 2-2 draw with Chelsea on Wednesday.

headline.main: 10-Man PSG Stun Chelsea With Thiago Silva Header
headline.print_headline: 10-Man PSG Stun Chelsea With Thiago Silva Header

docs.snippet: The original Pepsi Challenge ad campaign pitted Pepsi against Coke. The new global version blends social responsibility with popular culture....
docs.lead_paragraph: The original Pepsi Challenge ad campaign pitted Pepsi against Coke. The new global version blends social responsibility with popular culture.
docs.abstract: Pepsi hires crowd of celebrities, including Usher, Serena Williams and Usain Bolt, to recruit consumers to participate in series of challenges meant to promote brand to social media generation; campaign is latest incarnation of famous Pepsi Challenge.

headline.main: The Pepsi Challenge Is Returning, but This Time for the Social Media Generation
headline.print_headline: The Pepsi Challenge Is Returning, but This Time for the Social Media Generation
